bibl.title: Critical miscellanies
bibl.seg: 145.4 B.G.U. II, 673; 680; III, 737 C.P.R. VIII, 78 P. Flor. I, 38; III, 303; 348; 349; 377 verso P. Got. 18; 39 P. Lond. II, 210 descr.; Inv. 2017 P. Merton II, 99 recto P. Mich. Inv. 1818; 3708 P. Princ. II, 64; 90; III, 126 P.S.I. IV, 301; V, 480; VIII, 894; Inv. 1604 verso P. Sijp. 36 P. Yale Inv. 1559 S.P.P. X, 197; XX, 258; 260

1. Emending ancient scribes: P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1559 [ed.: Jennifer WEINTRITT, A Private Letter in the Beinecke Collection, BASP 53 (2016) pp. 145-148, figg.]; - P.S.I. Inv. 1604 verso [ed.: Marwa M.E. EL-ALFY, PSI inv. 1604 verso: lettera privata, Aegyptus 94 (2014 [2016]) pp. 13-17, 1 pl.; - 191.]. - 2. Abbreviated totals and carats: P. Merton II, 99 recto; - P. Princ. II, 90; - S.B. XXII, 15814 [= P. Mich. Inv. 1818]. - 3. Other abbreviation issues: B.G.U. II, 680 = S.P.P. VIII, 782; - P. Got. 18; - P. Princ. II, 64; - P. Princ. III, 126; - P. Sijp. 36; - P.S.I. V, 480; - S.B. I, 5112 [= P. Lond. II, 210 descr.]; - S.B. VI, 8988 [P. Lond. Inv. 2017]; - S.P.P. X, 197; - S.P.P. XX, 258; - S.P.P. XX, 260. - 4. Some personal names re-read: B.G.U. II, 673; - B.G.U. III, 737; - C.P.R. VIII, 78; - P. Flor. III, 349; - P. Got. 39; - P.S.I. VIII, 894; - S.B. XVIII, 13916 [= P. Mich. Inv. 3708]. - 5. Florentine trivia: P. Flor. I, 38; - P. Flor. III, 303; - P. Flor. III, 348; - P. Flor. III, 377 verso; - P.S.I. IV, 301.
